text: Rossana Maria Briceño ( born July 26th, 1968) is the First Lady of Belize, Spouse of the Prime Minister of Belize Hon. John Briceño. She is the Special Envoy of Belize for the Development of Families and Children. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies Category:Belizean people
title: Rossana Briceño
